original_title: Treasure: From Tragedy to Trans Justice Mapping a Detroit Story
overview: Treasure is a feature documentary about nineteen year old trans woman Shelly 'Treasure' Hilliard whose murder involved police coercion, Jim Crow drug laws, the criminalization of sex work and transphobia. It is about a young Detroit trans community activated by her death, and her family who are suing for justice.
title: Treasure: From Tragedy to Trans Justice Mapping a Detroit Story
